title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 18, 1861
summary: Hotchkiss describes the return of paroled prisoners captured in a recent battle. He also gives his wife instructions concerning items he wishes sent to him.
keywords: Prisons/Prisoners, Military Authority, National Government, Family, Church/Religious Activity, Troop Movement, Women, Home Front, Slavery, African Americans, American Civil War
